name: Gi Sfyri's Fury
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Requirements There is earth present and you are on the material plane.
-
The spirits that reside in Gi Sfyri and the surrounding earth come together to eat at your enemies' life force. Every third successful Strike targeting the same creature made with Gi Sfyri increases the target's Drained value by 1.
